TF055080-FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA
            - APPRAISAL, SUPERVISION, COMPLETION,TF055353-RECONSTRUCTION OF ACEH LAND

abstracts.cdata!:
The Indonesia Reconstruction of Aceh
            Land Administration System Project improves land tenure
            security in Aceh after the devastation caused by the tsunami
            and the destruction of evidence of ownership. The specific
            aims are 1) to recover and protect ownership land rights of
            the people affected and in the surrounding areas; and 2) to
            rebuild the land administration system. There are three main
            components. Component A reconstructs property rights and
            supports the issue of land titles. Component B reconstructs
            national land administration agencies. Component C finances
            project management.
